// In your reducers folder, e.g., favoriteJobsSlice.js
import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export const favoriteJobsSlice=createSlice({name:'favoriteJobs',initialState:{favoriteJobsCount:0,favoriteJobsList:[]},reducers:{setFavoriteJobsCount:(state,action)=>{state.favoriteJobsCount=action.payload;},addFavoriteJob:(state,action)=>{state.favoriteJobsList.push(action.payload);state.favoriteJobsCount=state.favoriteJobsList.length;},removeFavoriteJob:(state,action)=>{state.favoriteJobsList=state.favoriteJobsList.filter(job=>job.id!==action.payload.id);state.favoriteJobsCount=state.favoriteJobsList.length;}}});export const{setFavoriteJobsCount,addFavoriteJob,removeFavoriteJob}=favoriteJobsSlice.actions;export const selectFavoriteJobsCount=state=>state.favoriteJobs.favoriteJobsCount;export const selectFavoriteJobsList=state=>state.favoriteJobs.favoriteJobsList;export default favoriteJobsSlice.reducer;
